unlockPublishing.title: Unlock publishing [FR]
unlockPublishing.paragraph1: Before you publish your first form, provide the contact information of your manager or the person you report to. GC Forms will not display their contact information publicly. [FR]

field1.title: Provide the email of your manager, or the person you report to (required) [FR]
field1.description: We'll notify them about your publishing ability in GC Forms and our service level agreement. [FR]

field2.title: What department or organization do you work for? (required) [FR]

field3.title: What are your program or service goals? (required) [FR]

whatNext.title: Quelle est la suite?
whatNext.paragraph1: Quelqu’un traitera votre demande et informera votre gestionnaire de l’état de votre publication.
whatNext.paragraph2: Rappelons qu’il peut s’écouler jusqu’à 24 heures avant de pouvoir publier.
whatNext.paragraph3: Vous recevrez une notification par courriel lorsqu’on aura autorisé votre publication.
whatNext.paragraph4: Entre-temps, vous pouvez tout de même consulter et rédiger des formulaires.

submissionError: There was an error. Please try again later. [FR]
